   136	            "max_tokens": output_len,
   137	            "ignore_eos": True,
   138	            "stream": False,
   139	        }
   140	    elif backend == "tgi":
   141	        assert not use_beam_search
   142	        params = {
   143	            "best_of": best_of,
   144	            "max_new_tokens": output_len,
   145	            "do_sample": True,
   146	        }
   147	        pload = {
   148	            "inputs": prompt,
   149	            "parameters": params,
   150	        }
   151	    elif backend == "srt":
   152	        assert not use_beam_search
   153	        params = {
   154	            "ignore_eos": True,
   155	            "max_new_tokens": output_len,
   156	        }
   157	        pload = {
   158	            "text": prompt,
   159	            "sampling_params": params,
   160	        }
   161	    elif backend == "lightllm":
   162	        assert not use_beam_search
   163	        params = {
   164	            "ignore_eos": True,
   165	            "max_new_tokens": output_len,
   166	        }
   167	        pload = {
   168	            "inputs": prompt,
   169	            "parameters": params,
   170	        }
   171	    elif backend == "ginfer":
   172	        pass
   173	    else:
   174	        raise ValueError(f"Unknown backend: {backend}")
   175	
   176	    if backend != "ginfer":
   177	        timeout = aiohttp.ClientTimeout(total=3 * 3600)
   178	        async with aiohttp.ClientSession(timeout=timeout) as session:
   179	            while True:
   180	                async with session.post(
   181	                    api_url, headers=headers, json=pload
   182	                ) as response:
   183	                    chunks = []
   184	                    async for chunk, _ in response.content.iter_chunks():
   185	                        chunks.append(chunk)
   186	                output = b"".join(chunks).decode("utf-8")
   187	                output = json.loads(output)
   188	
   189	                # Re-send the request if it failed.
   190	                if "error" not in output:
   191	                    break
   192	                else:
   193	                    print(output)
   194	    else:
   195	        import grpc
   196	        from ginfer import sampler_pb2, sampler_pb2_grpc
   197	
   198	        api_url = api_url.replace("http://", "").replace("/generate", "")
   199	        sampler_channel = grpc.aio.insecure_channel(api_url)
   200	        sampler = sampler_pb2_grpc.SamplerStub(sampler_channel)
   201	
   202	        request_end_time = time.perf_counter()
   203	        sample_request = sampler_pb2.SampleTextRequest(
   204	            prompt=prompt,
   205	            settings=sampler_pb2.SampleSettings(
   206	                max_len=output_len,
   207	                rng_seed=0,
   208	                temperature=0,
   209	                nucleus_p=1,
   210	            ),
   211	        )
   212	        stream = sampler.SampleText(sample_request)
   213	        response = "".join([x.text async for x in stream])

   215	    request_end_time = time.perf_counter()
   216	    request_latency = request_end_time - request_start_time
   217	    REQUEST_LATENCY.append((prompt_len, output_len, request_latency))
   218	
   219	
   220	async def benchmark(
   221	    backend: str,
   222	    api_url: str,
   223	    input_requests: List[Tuple[str, int, int]],
   224	    best_of: int,
   225	    use_beam_search: bool,
   226	    request_rate: float,
   227	) -> None:
   228	    tasks: List[asyncio.Task] = []
   229	    async for request in get_request(input_requests, request_rate):
   230	        prompt, prompt_len, output_len = request
   231	        task = asyncio.create_task(
   232	            send_request(
   233	                backend,
   234	                api_url,
   235	                prompt,
   236	                prompt_len,
   237	                output_len,
   238	                best_of,
   239	                use_beam_search,
   240	            )
   241	        )
   242	        tasks.append(task)
   243	    await tqdm_asyncio.gather(*tasks)
   244	
   245	
   246	def main(args: argparse.Namespace):
   247	    print(args)
   248	    random.seed(args.seed)
   249	    np.random.seed(args.seed)
   250	
   251	    api_url = f"http://{args.host}:{args.port}/generate"
   252	    if args.tokenizer.endswith(".json") or args.tokenizer.endswith(".model"):
   253	        from sglang.srt.hf_transformers_utils import get_tokenizer
   254	
   255	        tokenizer = get_tokenizer(args.tokenizer)
   256	    else:
   257	        tokenizer = AutoTokenizer.from_pretrained(
   258	            args.tokenizer, trust_remote_code=args.trust_remote_code
   259	        )
   260	
   261	    if args.dataset:
   262	        input_requests = sample_requests(args.dataset, args.num_prompts, tokenizer)
   263	    else:
   264	        input_lens = np.random.randint(
   265	            int(args.input_len * args.range_ratio),
   266	            args.input_len + 1,
   267	            size=args.num_prompts,
   268	        )
   269	        output_lens = np.random.randint(
   270	            int(args.output_len * args.range_ratio),
   271	            args.output_len + 1,
   272	            size=args.num_prompts,
   273	        )
   274	        offsets = np.random.randint(0, tokenizer.vocab_size, size=args.num_prompts)
   275	        input_requests = []
   276	        for i in range(args.num_prompts):
   277	            prompt = tokenizer.decode(
   278	                [
   279	                    (offsets[i] + i + j) % (tokenizer.vocab_size - 129) + 128
   280	                    for j in range(input_lens[i])
   281	                ]
   282	            )
   283	            input_requests.append((prompt, int(input_lens[i]), int(output_lens[i])))
   284	
   285	    benchmark_start_time = time.perf_counter()
   286	    asyncio.run(
   287	        benchmark(
   288	            args.backend,
   289	            api_url,
   290	            input_requests,
   291	            args.best_of,
   292	            args.use_beam_search,
   293	            args.request_rate,
   294	        )
   295	    )
   296	    benchmark_end_time = time.perf_counter()
   297	    benchmark_time = benchmark_end_time - benchmark_start_time
   298	
   299	    # Compute the statistics.
   300	    latencies = [latency for _, _, latency in REQUEST_LATENCY]
   301	    avg_latency = np.mean(latencies)
   302	    avg_per_token_latency = np.mean(
   303	        [
   304	            latency / (prompt_len + output_len)
   305	            for prompt_len, output_len, latency in REQUEST_LATENCY
   306	        ]
   307	    )
   308	    avg_per_output_token_latency = np.mean(
   309	        [latency / output_len for _, output_len, latency in REQUEST_LATENCY]
   310	    )
   311	    decoding_throughput = (
   312	        np.sum([output_len for _, output_len, _ in REQUEST_LATENCY]) / benchmark_time
   313	    )
   314	
   315	    print(f"Total time: {benchmark_time:.2f} s")
   316	    print(f"Request throughput: {args.num_prompts / benchmark_time:.2f} requests/s")
   317	    print(f"Decoding throughput: {decoding_throughput:.2f} token/s")

   319	    print(f"Average latency per token: {avg_per_token_latency:.2f} s")
   320	    print(f"Average latency per output token: {avg_per_output_token_latency:.2f} s")
   321
